text: @realDonaldTrump Before this you couldn't get a White House daily briefing! You can't go to rallies so you turn a coronavirus briefing into a Trump rally! 43,796 dead because of your incompetence! Even in an epidemic You make it all about you! THE AMERICAN PEOPLE ARE DYING!!! https://t.co/CVta914tfZ
